text: Zenjitsu (made) kare no tachiba o urayande ita-sha-tachi wa, ii hajimeta. `Ā , hontōni arrā wa, o nozomi no shimo be-tachi ni, ōku mo, mata sukunaku mo, megumareru (koto ga wakatta). Arrā no fukai o megumi ga nakattanaraba, watashi-tachi mo kitto (ji no naka ni) umatte itadearou. Ā, fushinjin no mono-tachi wa, kesshite seikō shinai koto ga wakarimashita
